MemeDef.label: vow of nonviolence
MemeDef.description:
We are committed to bringing about a world of peace, harmony, laughter, and love. We take this vow to be nonviolent in our thoughts, our speech, and our actions.

<color=#33d733>This is a very challenging meme, as ALL colonists of this ideoligion will be incapable of combat, and can only defend themselves in three ways: traps, turrets, and having a multi-ideo colony with some "defenders" who don't share the same values.</color>

Oskar quote: "please no xd this is actually game breaking".

conflict(tag=meme_Monastic) ->An old [foeLeader] saw the austere and humble lifestyle of the [memberNamePlural] and despised what [foeLeader_pronoun] saw. In [foeLeader_possessive] eyes the monastery had to be destroyed.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Monastic) ->[founderName], a great theologist, reasoned with the [foeLeader], explaining that the monastery was a testament to [deity0_name]'s Will.
victory(tag=meme_Monastic) ->The [foeLeader] was convinced, and decided to spend the rest of [foeLeader_possessive] life in monastic seclusion.

setup(tag=meme_Monastic) ->[founderName] was a theologist in one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] posited that a life of gluttony and vices is meaningless, and that only by living an austere, monastic life can one reach true enlightenment.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Monastic) ->[founderName] showed us that spending your life in contemplation and meditation is a truly worthy endeavour.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Monastic) ->The oldest yogi in our colony was a scholar on the art of Transcendental Meditation. He taught me that
lesson(tag=meme_Monastic) ->spending your life in contemplation and meditation is a truly worthy endeavour
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Monastic) ->A life of gluttony and vices is meaningless, and only by living an austere, monastic life can one reach true enlightenment.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Monastic) ->The archotechs are supreme beings, able to span the whole of existence with their vast minds.
archistFact(tag=meme_Monastic) ->A life of gluttony and vices is obscene to the archotechs, and only by living an austere, monastic life can one reach true transcendence.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only those who spend their life in contemplation and meditation to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Monastic) ->The spirits are pure minds, observing all of creation from behind the veil.
animistFact(tag=meme_Monastic) ->A life of gluttony and vices is obscene to the spirits, and only by living an austere, monastic life can one reach true enlightenment.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic) ->[itIsSaid] only those who spend their life in contemplation and meditation will one day commune fully with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic)->[itIsSaid] we will spend our lives in contemplation and meditation, singing the praises to our beloved insects.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic)->The eldritch entities prey on the vices of humanity. As such, we will spend our lives in contemplation and meditation, adhering to a monastic lifestyle that won't attract their unwanted attentions.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic)->Such occult knowledge requires a serene mind. We will spend our lives in contemplation and meditation and thus reach true enlightenment.

eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Monastic)->The obscene vices of humanity are abhorrent, and should be destroyed. We will spend our lives in contemplation and meditation and the end of all things will find us pure of mind.

introMemo(tag=meme_Monastic)->We are happy to announce that per our austerity policy we are beginning a meditation program. The program will begin with some initial training that teaching employees how to meditate. We will provide access to in-person training, online classes, recorded materials and a combination of all of these.

alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic)->These poor wayward creations of humanity remind us that science has led us through a path of excess and vices, and only by rejecting these can we reach true enlightenment.
